title: Pride Alliance W Connect News Channel
content:
The W Connect team member app is available to all U.S. team members. Get access to these great features:
· Valuable resources like paystubs, benefits and perks, all in one place.
· Real-time news and updates right where you are, tailored to you.
· Subscribe to the W Connect Pride Alliance BRG News Channel to stay informed about chapter events and engage with social media-style content.
If you have questions or want to learn more, download the app via the iOS or Android app store, and log in using your OneID and password. You will also need to enter your two-factor authentication "ping code."
